main event: A report of a fiery object observed on April 9, 1959, traveling at a high rate of speed and changing color before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 2,500 feet,The fiery object was visible for approximately one minute,It changed colors from orange to white during the sighting,Two additional witnesses confirmed the observation,The report includes multiple sightings of round, bright objects over several months.
witness description: observers including military personnel and civilians
